casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jonathan Denard BOYCE. No. 129A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 9, 2007. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of April 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Jonathan Denard Boyce) shall have up to and including the 23rd day of April 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of April 2007."
